LanguageData.NobleApparel.label: noble apparel
LanguageData.NobleApparel.description: Tailor noble-specific apparel like formal shirts and royal robes.
LanguageData.RoyalApparel.label: royal apparel
LanguageData.RoyalApparel.description: Tailor royal apparel of the highest tier, like royal robes and crowns.
LanguageData.CataphractArmor.label: cataphract armor
LanguageData.CataphractArmor.description: Craft cataphract armor, heavy powered armor that slows the user but which can absorb extreme punishment. Note that these also require advanced components.
LanguageData.JumpPack.label: jump packs
LanguageData.JumpPack.description: Build jump packs to perform aerial assaults during combat.
LanguageData.Gunlink.label: gunlink
LanguageData.Gunlink.description: Build wearable gunlinks to enhance your soldiers' shooting accuracy.
LanguageData.BrainWiring.label: brain wiring
LanguageData.BrainWiring.description: Craft brain implants that induce or prevent blunt sensations like joy or pain.
LanguageData.SpecializedLimbs.label: specialized limbs
LanguageData.SpecializedLimbs.description: Craft specialized bionic limbs built for specific purposes - both combat and labor.
LanguageData.CompactWeaponry.label: compact weaponry
LanguageData.CompactWeaponry.description: Craft compact, concealable bionic weapons which can be embedded in various body parts.
LanguageData.VenomSynthesis.label: poison synthesis
LanguageData.VenomSynthesis.description: Craft bionics that synthesize venom from internal chemical reactors for use in toxifying attacks.
LanguageData.ArtificialMetabolism.label: artificial metabolism
LanguageData.ArtificialMetabolism.description: Craft bionics that process food more safely or efficiently than a biological stomach.
LanguageData.NeuralComputation.label: neural computation
LanguageData.NeuralComputation.description: Craft brain implants that assist thought and learning by use of a direct, shallow brain-computer interface.
LanguageData.SkinHardening.label: skin hardening
LanguageData.SkinHardening.description: Craft bionic implants which induce the toughening of natural skin, producing an armor-like effect.
LanguageData.HealingFactors.label: healing factors
LanguageData.HealingFactors.description: Craft bionics that enhance natural healing processes.
LanguageData.FleshShaping.label: flesh shaping
LanguageData.FleshShaping.description: Craft bionics which induce the reshaping of natural flesh, usually for the purposes of aesthetic enhancement or personal pleasure.
LanguageData.MolecularAnalysis.label: molecular analysis
LanguageData.MolecularAnalysis.description: Craft bionics with molecular analyzers for assisting the immune system or analyzing food.
LanguageData.CircadianInfluence.label: circadian influence
LanguageData.CircadianInfluence.description: Craft brain implants that chemically manipulate the circadian rhythm, reducing or altering the need to sleep.
LanguageData.Harp.label: harp
LanguageData.Harp.description: Craft the harp, a simple stationary musical instrument popular among nobility in some cultures.
LanguageData.Harpsichord.label: harpsichord
LanguageData.Harpsichord.description: Craft the harpsichord, a complex stationary musical instrument.
LanguageData.Piano.label: piano
LanguageData.Piano.description: Craft the piano, an advanced stationary musical instrument.
